alert.note: Alert for Adair; Madison (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 05 at 4:26PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CST FOR MADISON AND SOUTHEASTERN ADAIR COUNTIES... At 425 PM CST, a confirmed tornado was located 11 miles northeast of Green Valley Lake, or 13 miles southeast of Greenfield, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and two inch hail. SOURCE...Weather spotters confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Winterset, East Peru, Macksburg and Winterset-Madison County Airport. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
